meta.title: PROTOFOLIO_ by siddharthmhjn.com
meta.description: Tony Stark - CEO of Stark Industries and Iron Man. Building technology to protect the world and power the future.

hero.description: I am Iron Man. Building cutting-edge technology that protects the world and powers the future. From arc reactor clean energy to AI-driven defense systems.

about.title: Building the Future of Everything
about.subtitle: Pioneering arc reactor technology, artificial intelligence, and nanotechnology to protect and power the world

cards.title: Arc Reactor Technology
cards.description: Invented miniaturized arc reactor providing clean, unlimited energy. Powers the Iron Man suits and entire buildings.

cards.title: Artificial Intelligence
cards.description: Created J.A.R.V.I.S., F.R.I.D.A.Y., and EDITH - advanced AI systems managing everything from suit operations to global defense.

cards.title: Iron Man Armor
cards.description: Designed 85+ iterations of powered exoskeleton suits featuring nanotech, weapons systems, and space capabilities.

journey: Genius inventor and CEO of Stark Industries - transformed from weapons manufacturer to clean energy pioneer.
Built the first Iron Man suit in a cave with a box of scraps. Created 85+ suit iterations with advanced nanotech.
Founding member of the Avengers. Led Earth's Mightiest Heroes against Ultron, Thanos, and cosmic threats.
Cracked the code for time travel and saved half the universe. I am Iron Man.

experience.title: CEO & Lead Inventor
responsibilities: Transformed company from weapons manufacturer to clean energy and technology leader
Invented arc reactor technology providing unlimited clean energy
Created 85+ iterations of Iron Man armor with advanced AI integration

experience.title: Founding Member
responsibilities: Co-founded Earth's Mightiest Heroes with Captain America, Thor, and others
Led defense of New York against Chitauri invasion
Developed Ultron (learning experience) and helped create Vision
Made the sacrifice play against Thanos to save the universe

experience.title: Quantum Engineer
responsibilities: Cracked the code for time travel when everyone said it was impossible
Designed Time-Space GPS for quantum realm navigation
Enabled Avengers to retrieve Infinity Stones from the past
Reversed the Snap, saving half of all life in the universe

projects.title: Iron Man Armor Series
projects.description: 85+ iterations of powered exoskeleton suits with flight, weapons, AI integration, and bleeding-edge nanotech.

projects.title: J.A.R.V.I.S. AI System
projects.description: Advanced natural language AI managing complex systems, security protocols, and suit operations. Eventually became Vision.

projects.title: Arc Reactor Technology
projects.description: Miniaturized particle accelerator providing clean, unlimited energy. Powers suits, buildings, and the future.

projects.title: Time-Space GPS
projects.description: Quantum realm navigation device enabling time travel. Used to save half the universe.

certifications.title: MIT - Summa Cum Laude
certifications.description: Graduated top of class with doctorate in Physics and Engineering. Youngest graduate in MIT history.

certifications.title: Avengers Security Clearance
certifications.description: Highest security clearance for access to classified Avengers operations and global defense systems.

certifications.title: Infinity Gauntlet Wielder
certifications.description: Successfully wielded all six Infinity Stones to reverse the Snap and defeat Thanos.

awards.title: Saved the Universe
awards.description: Used the Infinity Gauntlet to reverse the Snap and defeat Thanos, sacrificing everything to save half of all life.

awards.title: Person of the Year
awards.description: Recognized for leading the defense of New York City against Chitauri invasion and carrying a nuke through a wormhole.

awards.title: Apogee Award
awards.description: Honored for advancing technology and clean energy innovation through arc reactor development.

testimonials.name: Steve Rogers
testimonials.quote: The most annoying person I've ever met, but also one of the bravest. When it mattered most, he made the sacrifice play.

testimonials.name: Pepper Potts
testimonials.quote: Behind the armor was the most selfless person I've ever known. I watched him grow from having everything to giving everything.

testimonials.name: Peter Parker
testimonials.quote: Mr. Stark believed in me when no one else did. He gave me a chance and showed me what it really means to be a hero.
